item.title: Drain cover loose, 17th December
item.description:
Drain cover loose after recent road repairs. Making loud noise as traffic goes over it late into night and stars again around 4am as this is Greenwich High Rd. Outside Serica Court, over 55's, disturbing elderly and sick. Also dangerous as clearly loose.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
